p: Firebase integration: Auth (anonymous), Firestore (level persistence), offline support

f.auth.ts: Firebase Auth service (anonymous auth, state management)
f.types.ts: Level type definitions (Block, CameraState, Level, LevelSummary, etc.)
f.levels.ts: Firestore level CRUD service (create, read, update, delete, list)

x: getUserId: Get current user ID (throws if not authenticated)
isAuthInitialized: Check if auth has been initialized
Block: Block interface for Firestore storage
CameraState: Camera state for view restoration
Level: Client-side level with ID and Date timestamps
LevelSummary: Level summary for list display
listLevels: List all levels for current user
getLevel: Get single level by ID with ownership verification
createLevel: Create new level with 5-level limit enforcement
updateLevel: Update level with ownership verification
deleteLevel: Delete level with ownership verification
getMaxLevels: Get maximum levels allowed per user
r: ../ui/index.ts: Imports level CRUD functions and types for level management
